name: Minotaur
description: The Minotaur, a brutish, humanoid monster with the head of a bull. Clothed in nothing but a loincloth and the blood of many a slain foe, The Minotaur sees you as only one thing: an easy target!
moveDescriptions: The Minotaur raises its bloodstained axe and takes a mighty swing!
The Minotaur crosses its arms before its face, anticipating an attack!
The Minotaur stamps its hooves and growls, glaring straight at you with naught but fury in its blood-red eyes...
